title: Baby Carrier
description: three embroidered panels on red, green and gold cross stitched band with fringe; top and bottom black panels have tiny red and green cross stitch in geometric patterns; middle panel lighter weight black with central star like pattern in very fine cross stitch in pink, green and tan; commercial prints border first and second sections and lining of third
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
